Class PieceOne

  • java.lang.Object
    • GamePiece
      • PieceOne
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Piece

    public class PieceOne
extends GamePiece
    Is knight with attack of 2 and health of 8. Its move range and attack is 1. Contains methods such as move, attack, health, and removal methods. Contains additional methods such as PieceType and PieceOneToString.
    Version:
    May 28, 2019
    Author:
    Ajeet, Matthew, Period: 4th, Assignment: APCSFinalProject, Sources: None
